kv16.9:1.3: Samāpattesiyaṃ upapattesiyaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, samāpattesiyena cittena upapattesiyena cittena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇanti?
kv16.9:1.5: nanu na samāpattesiyaṃ na upapattesiyaṃ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, na samāpattesiyena cittena na upapattesiyena cittena na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇanti?
kv16.9:1.7: Hañci na samāpattesiyaṃ na upapattesiyaṃ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, na samāpattesiyena cittena …pe…
kv16.9:1.8: ekārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.9:2.3: Samāpattesiyaṃ upapattesiyaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, samāpattesiyena cittena upapattesiyena cittena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇanti?
kv16.9:2.5: nanu na samāpattesiyaṃ na upapattesiyaṃ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, na samāpattesiyena cittena …pe…
kv16.9:2.9: ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.9:3.6: Hañci kāmāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv16.9:3.7: “rūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, arūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ arūpāvacaran”ti.
